nodes.bodyText: Constants that also exist in ZMS project. Prefered to avoid deleting them and redirecting to the common constants at this point as it will require changes in a lot of files (redirecting them to the common version).

nodes.bodyText: Kept the same property value even though it is now in Common to avoid breaking existing clients.

Utils that also exist in ZMS project. Preferred to avoid deleting them and redirecting to the common utils at this point as it will require changes in a lot of files (redirecting them to the common version).
